name: Neko Ninja
description:
Escape the canine castle as a ninja cat!
Controls:

Keyboard:

A, D - Left, Right

Space - Jump

LCtrl - Throw shuriken

R - Restart

PS4:

Joystick - Move

O - Jump

X - Throw Shuriken

◻ - Restart

Updates:

(17 May, 2021) Minor changes for accessability; no modifications to the game was made

- Added controller support

- Changed shuriken throwing to LCtrl instead of LShift to prevent sticky keys

Credits:

turtttle:  Programming and level design

thirteenz.zei:  Art and sfx

Font:

Type Writer by Mandy Smith

Songs:

Cyborg Ninja by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

(This game was created for Mini Jam 80: Cats)
